longBusinessSummary: V.I.P. Industries Limited manufactures and sells luggage, backpacks, and accessories in India. It provides hard luggage and soft luggage bags, including school bags, trolleys, backpacks, suitcases, executive cases, duffels, overnight travel solutions, and handbags. The company offers its products primarily under the VIP, Caprese, Carlton, Skybags, Alfa, and Aristocrat brands through multi-brand outlets, exclusive brand outlets, canteen stores department, and e-commerce platforms. It also exports its products. V.I.P. Industries Limited was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
